item.title: matplot
item.description:
Key Points: multi-backends Mostly used parts(Artist Layer) Artist attributes Types: Axis Scripting Layer (pyplot) I have to look up the manual every time I plot with matplotlib, which quite frustrating. There are posts on the same topic both in English and Chinese1. This is a brief summarize of 1. I’ll only list the key points, and only explain when necessary.
Key Points:
